excerpt: Warm and comforting lentil soup that is vegan friendly

ingredients.name: Lentils
ingredients.notes: green or brown, rinsed and drained

instructions.name: Soup
instructions: In a large pot, heat some oil over medium heat.
Add onions, garlic, carrots, and celery. Cook until onion is translucent.
Add bay leaves, cumin, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Stir and cook for another minute.
Add vegetable broth, lentils, and diced tomatoes to the pot.
Bring the mixture to a boil.
Reduce the heat and let the soup simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Remove the bay leaves from the soup.
Ladle the soup into bowls and sprinkle chopped parsley and lemon juice on top.
